Luthetus.Extensions.Git.Displays.GitDisplay Class Reference Luthetus.Extensions.Git.Displays.GitDisplay
Long term goal is to support any arbitrary version control system. For now, implement a Git UI, this lets us get a feel for what the interface should be.

Detailed Description
Long term goal is to support any arbitrary version control system. For now, implement a Git UI, this lets us get a feel for what the interface should be.
